explains: adj. 光荣的，荣幸的；受尊敬的；已承兑或付款的
v. 尊重（某人）；给以……荣誉；执行（承诺）（honor 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.en: The Manager, when introducing him to the public, added these words, "Most honored audience!"
sentences.cn: 经理在向公众介绍他时，加上了这句话：“最尊敬的观众！”

sentences.en: Airline travelers need to be confident that their bookings will be honored.
sentences.cn: 航空公司的旅客可以放心，他们的预订会得到兑现。

sentences.en: He was honored with a scholarship.
